"The Campship": "This is the Campship, where you can get ready before starting a quest."

"Each quest has a set objective. The requirements for completing a quest vary, such as wiping out the enemies that appear, or earning quest points.  When you fulfill the requirements, you will be rewarded accordingly."
"The Campship has a basic shop, although it lacks the variety of the ARKS lobby. You can also store items in your storage."
